spec.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a detailed instruction about how a building, car, piece of equipment etc should be made
spec.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: the specs for the company’s new video games console
spec.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: detailed instructions about how something should be designed or made
spec.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: We have made a few alterations to the design spec.
spec.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: the spec of a machine, computer etc is the combination of all its special features
spec.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The two cars share very similar specs.
spec.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: if you do something on spec, you do it without being sure that you will get what you are hoping for
spec.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: I sent in an application on spec, but I still haven’t heard from them about any jobs.
